welcomeContent: The Search page allows you to query all information published in the Clearing-House. Records can be found by typing a word in the free text search field and/or by using a combination of filters to narrow your search.
globalSearchContent: Global filters allow you to search the entire database through all record categories by selecting one or multiple options within the Record types, Keywords, Country, Regions and Date filters.
freeTextContent:
This search box allows you to query the entire database by typing word(s) of your choice.

Tip: Change the language of the website (top right corner) before typing in that language.
recordTypesFilterTabContent: Select one or more record types to search by specific category(ies) of records: National, Reference or SCBD.
keywordsFilterTabContent:
Select one or more keywords from the list.
If you have already filtered by record type, the keyword filters displayed will be applicable specifically to that record type.
countryFilterTabContent:
Select one or more countries from the list.

Tip: Click on a letter to view all countries that start with that letter. You can also filter by countries that are 'Parties', 'Non-Parties' and 'Ratified, not yet Party'.
regionFilterTabContent: Select from the pre-defined list of regions and/or regional groups.
dateFilterTabContent: The Date filter allows you to search for records published within (i) a pre-determined date range (e.g. “Last 7 Days”); or (ii) a date range that you can specify (“Custom Range”); or (iii) on a specific day of any year.
closeFilterTabContent: To view search results, scroll down or click on the (x) button at the top right corner.
searchResultContent:
Search results are displayed in separate tabs organized by record category. Click on a tab to view records associated with that category.

Note: The black circle indicates the total number of records in each category and will automatically change based on your search selections.
subFiltersContent:
Sub-filters appear when you select one or more record types within the Record types global filter.
They appear on the left-hand side and are associated with each selected record type.
You can use sub-filters in combination with global filters to further narrow your search.
recordViewContent: Once you locate the record of interest, click on it to view full details.
viewTypeContent: You can change the display of records by selecting the preferred option from the drop-down list.
sortByContent: Sort your search results by selecting one or more fields.
sendRecordsContent: Click here to share your search results.
exportRecordsContent: Click here to export the information to a spreadsheet format.
needHelpContent: Click here to access contextual help where you can find more information related to the Search page.
needMoreHelpContent: Use the Chat feature to message us for additional support.
